title: Current Equipment and Software Capital Expenditures; Diffusion Index for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Current Equipment and Software Capital Expenditures reports the change in equipment and software capital expenditures compared to the previous month for reporting service firms. The diffusion index is calculated by taking the percent reporting increases and subtracting the percentage reporting decreases. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit: http://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/ .
